name: hococli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(c1, c2), c0), chba))

stmt.origin: eqeltrd(cfv(ccom(c1, c2), c0), chba, cfv(c1, cfv(c2, c0)), wcel(c0, chba))
stmt.pretty: eqeltrd(((c1 ∘ c2)` c0), chba, (c1 `(c2 ` c0)), c0 ∈ ~H)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(c1, c2), c0), chba))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, c2), c0), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c2, c0)), chba))

cumulated.origin:

-| wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c2, c0)), chba))

-| wf(c1, chba, chba)
-| wf(c2, chba, chba)

-| wf(c2, chba, chba)

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(c1, cfv(c2, c0)), chba), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), chba))

comment: Closure of composition of Hilbert space operators. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
